content:
Dace looks seriously at you. “Do you think you can keep helping me get to the Plummet?” she asks. “If not, I think I should head back.”

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Agree to keep helping. Discard all   from Dace.

B) Part ways. Discard Dace and return HELPING HAND to your collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
